Palmdale.Antelope Valley Mall:
The Antelope Valley Mall is an enclosed shopping mall in Palmdale, California before it was a Lancaster Town Center.
Opened in September 1990, its buildings take up around 1 million square feet (90,000 m²). Its physical main building, parking lots, and ring road businesses encompass an area a bit less than 0.5 by 0.5 miles (800 by 800 m)and it was a Lancaster Town Center.
